apps.name: WhenWorks
apps.subtitle: Meet without the back and forth.

press.summary: WhenWorks eliminates the back-and-forth by allowing others to book time with you online, only when you're free and only during time slots you've defined. Just share your scheduling link in email or on your website, then sit back and let WhenWorks do the rest.

apps.name: Pushcut
apps.subtitle: Triggers, notifications & widgets that kick off your automation.

press.summary: Pushcut allows you to send custom actionable notifications to other devices, create custom widgets, run background automations and even use a dedicated device to run Shortcuts at any time without needing to tap to approve it.

apps.name: FocusCuts
apps.subtitle: A macOS app which provides Shortcuts actions to get your current Focus mode, and lets you choose

press.summary: FocusCuts is a status bar application for macOS that gives you additional actions for Shortcuts. FocusCuts also gives you a custom list of Shortcuts per Focus Mode allowing you to have different lists of easily accessible Shortcuts available as you need them.

apps.name: Logger
apps.subtitle: The first developer console designed for Shortcuts.

press.summary: Logger makes it easy to build and debug advanced Shortcuts by allowing users to easily log messages from within their Shortcuts, making building advanced Shortcuts easier and faster.
